tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiseaseStudy (
  patient_id INT,
  disease_type VARCHAR,
  treatment_id INT,
  treatment_response VARCHAR,
  study_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseProgressionData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    disease_type VARCHAR,
    progression_stage VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentResponseData (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_type VARCHAR,
    treatment_duration INT,
    treatment_outcome VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE disease_progression (
    patient_id INT,
    disease_type VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    treatment_started_date DATE,
    treatment_response VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    smoker BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_details (
    treatment_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage FLOAT,
    treatment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Disease_Diagnosis (
    diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    disease_type VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatment_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
    dosage INT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatment_Outcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    outcome_date DATE,
    response_type VARCHAR(50),
    response_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseProgression (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  progression_status VARCHAR(50),
  severity_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE TreatmentResponse (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_id INT,
  response_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PatientDetails (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE PhysicianDetails (
  physician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  physician_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ClinicalTrials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)
